text.div:
• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes
    CodeDisplayDefinition
    HIV.C.DE95Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindicationContraindications to PrEP usage - Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindication
    HIV.C.DE96Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)Contraindications to PrEP usage - Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)
    HIV.C.DE97HIV-positiveContraindications to PrEP usage - HIV-positive
    HIV.C.DE98Low estimated creatinine clearanceContraindications to PrEP usage - Low estimated creatinine clearance
    HIV.C.DE99Acute HIV infection symptomsContraindications to PrEP usage - Acute HIV infection symptoms
    HIV.C.DE100Probable recent exposure to HIVContraindications to PrEP usage - Probable recent exposure to HIV

name: ContraindicationstoPrEPusageCodes
title: Contraindications to PrEP usage Codes
description: Codes representing possible values for the Contraindications to PrEP usage element

concept.display: Tenofovir disoproxil fumarate (TDF) allergy or contraindication
Other allergy or contraindication to a medicine in the PrEP regimen (specify)
